Development Environment

Plugin Development Environment

The development language for plugins in Shade Plugin SDK is C++. One of the following development environments listed below is required to use Shade Plugin SDK.

Windows

OS

  • Windows Vista 32bit / 64bit
  • Windows XP Professional x64 Edition
  • Windows XP Professional / Home Edition / Media Center Edition

develop tool

  • Visual Studio 2005 Team System / Professional Edition / Standard Edition
  • Visual C++ 2005 Express Edition
  • Windows 98 / Me / NT / 2000 are not supported.
    - Visual C++ 6.0 is not supported.
    - Visual Studio .NET Version 2002, 2003 is not supported.

Visual Studio 2005 Service Pack 1

Mac OS X

OS

  • Mac OS X 10.4.7 later

develop tool

  • Xcode 2.4 later
  • Classic / Mac OS 9 /Mac OS X 10.3 and previous versions are not supported.
    - CodeWarrior, Project Builder, Xcode2.3 are not supported.
    -

Apple Developer Connection
http://developer.apple.com/jp/

Plugin System Requirements

Plugins created in Shade 10 Plugin SDK work in Shade versions 9 Professional and Standard. Plugins are not supported in designer LE.
